import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" function EmpForm(){ const [id,setId]=useState("") const [name,setName]=useState("") const [email,setEmail]=useState("") const navigate=useNavigate() const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ const data={id,name,email} fetch("http://localhost:3007/users",{ method:"POST", headers:{"Content-type":"application/json"}, body:JSON.stringify(data) }) .then(()=>{ alert("Succesfuly saved") }) .catch((err)=>{ console.log(err.message) }) } return(

Employe create List

setId(e.target.value)} className="form-control"/>
setName(e.target.value)} className="form-control"/>
setEmail(e.target.value)} className="form-control"/>
{/* Back */}
) } export default EmpForm;
